channel.name: Webservice - 1. Service
channel.description:
This is work in progress showing how one can develop a web service that has an easy to discover API. This is the first step of showing how one can produce a tree of data and show some help data.
It will be possible to edit the help through this utility but in the release it's not there.
See:
http://help.interfaceware.com/kb/self-describing-web-service
